name: Tome of Knowledge
description: A magical book filled with ancient knowledge and wisdom.
looks: The tome is bound in aged leather with intricate embossed patterns. It emits a soft glow and feels weighty with the weight of knowledge.

special_effects.knowledge_gain: Increases experience gained from quests and battles by 20%.

name: Chaos Pendant
description: A mysterious pendant that harnesses chaotic energy.
looks: The pendant is made of a rare, black gemstone that seems to swirl with a chaotic energy. It is encased in a silver setting with intricate designs.

special_effects.chaos_aura: Emits a chaotic aura that confuses enemies in close proximity.

name: Mystic Wand
description: A magical wand that emanates a mysterious energy.
looks: The wand is made of polished wood and adorned with intricate carvings. It glows faintly with a soft blue light.

special_effects.mana_leech: Drains 2 mana from the target with each successful hit

name: Poisoned Dagger
description: A small dagger with a poisoned blade.
looks: The dagger has a short, thin blade made of dark steel. The handle is wrapped in black leather.

special_effects.poison: Has a chance to poison the target, dealing additional damage over time.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Amulet of Protection
description: A powerful amulet that provides enhanced protection to the wearer.
looks: The amulet is made of a shining golden metal, with intricate engravings of protective symbols. It has a large gemstone in the center that radiates a soft protective glow.

name: Ring of Strength
description: A ring that enhances the strength of the wearer.
looks: The ring is made of silver and has a large, intricately carved gemstone in the center.

name: Wand of Healing
description: A magical wand that heals wounds and restores vitality.
looks: The wand is made of polished silver with intricate engravings of healing symbols. It emits a soft, soothing light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Creates a small healing aura around the user, restoring additional health to nearby allies.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks
